mutants.code:
def count_valid_arrays(d: int, m: int) -> int:
    a = []
    i = 1
    while d > (1 << i + 1) - 1:
        a.append(1 << i)
        i += 1
    a.append((1 << i) - (1 << i + 1) + d + 1)
    ans = 1
    for x in a:
        ans *= x + 1
        ans %= m
    return (ans - 1) % m

        a.append(1 << i)
        i += 1
    a.append((-1 << i) - (1 << i + 1) + d + 1)
    ans = 1
    for x in a:
        ans *= x + 1
        ans %= m
    return (ans - 1) % m

def count_valid_arrays(d: int, m: int) -> int:
    a = []
    i = 0
    while d > (1 << i + 1) - 1:
        a.append(1 << i)
        i += 1
    a.append((1 << i) - (2 << i + 1) + d + 1)
    ans = 1
    for x in a:
        ans *= x + 1
        ans %= m
    return (ans - 1) % m
